content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Hello Max, I'm glad you could make it. I'm thinking of renting this apartment for 1000 Euros. It's a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.

If you want to continue the negotiation, please let me know. Otherwise, I don't want to continue the negotiation because the price is non-negotiable.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 1000 Euros is too high for me. I can't afford this price. 

 I am looking for an apartment for a lower price. Can you offer me a lower price for this apartment? Otherwise, I will look for another apartment.

 I am a smart, dependable, and responsible student. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

 I am looking for an apartment in the city center with a size of 50 square meters. I want to rent it for the lowest price possible. I hope you understand my position.

 Thank you for your time.

 If you want to continue the negotiation, please let me know. Otherwise, I will look for another apartment.

 Best regards, Max Müller.
User 1: Hello Max, I understand your position and I'm willing to offer you a discount. I can lower the price to 950 Euros. It's still a great deal considering the location and the quality of the apartment.

If you want to continue the negotiation, please let me know. Otherwise, I don't want to continue the negotiation because I can't lower the price any further.

Best regards, Mister Schmidt.

I will prepare the lease agreement and send it to you for your review. Once you sign it and return it to me, we can arrange the move-in date.

Thank you for choosing my apartment. I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant.

Best regards, Mister Schmidt.
